subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira, who missed two months with a torn tendon sheath in his right wrist, was forced to leave Saturday’s game in the fourth inning after he aggravated the wrist injury.
snippet: Mark Teixeira, who missed two months with a torn tendon sheath in his right wrist, was forced to leave Saturday’s game in the fourth inning after he aggravated the wrist injury.
